QuestData.Title: Report to Twocrush
QuestData.Description: A magical barrier pulses around you, chilling your bones. You feel secure behind this enchanted wall.$B$BTorg Twocrush will want to know what you've discovered here!
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Torg Twocrush at the Southern Rocketway Terminus in Azshara with news of your discovery.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Torg Twocrush at the Southern Rocketway Terminus in Azshara with news of your discovery.
QuestData.RewardText: An energy barrier, you say? This explains a great deal! I've seen firsthand how Naga leaders have been able to turn aside the blades of some of my best warriors.$B$BNow we know the source of their power, $n. Let's finish this!
